dmca.title: What's There to Hide?
dmca.body:
re: Demand for Removal of Contracts, Uploads
     http://contracts.onecle.com/rentrak/gbcc.guar.2000.05.shtml
     http://contracts.onecle.com/type/30.shtml
     http://contracts.onecle.com/rentrak/gbcc.loan.2000.05.26.shtml

Dear Sir/Madam:

It has come to our attention that the above-referenced Internet websites are displaying to the general public Guaranty Business Credit Corporation ("GBCC") contracts.  This activity has not been sanctioned or approved by GBCC.  As an indirect subsidiary of Temple-Island Inc., a Fortune 500 company, GBCC has a vested proprietary interest in the use of its name, logo and intellectual property in the public domain and vigorously monitors its presence on the Internet.

We accordingly demand that you immediately remove any and all documents that include the name Guaranty Business Credit Corporation from the sites listed above, as well as from any other sites which you own, control or operate.

We will review the sites within 15 days following the date of this letter to ensure that this request has been honored.  Please be advised that GBCC will not hesitate to employ all available legal remedies to protect its interests.

Thank you for your anticipated cooperation with this request.  Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions or would like to discuss this matter further.

Sincerely,
[private]
